QuestData.Title: Strange Findings
QuestData.Description: The crystal you found on the nightstalker runt's body appears to be a piece of the Exodar. This may help explain the unusual appearance and demeanor of some of the animals in this region.$B$BTake the crystal back to Azure Watch. The exarch will surely want to know about this discovery.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Faintly Glowing Crystal to Exarch Menelaous at Azure Watch.
QuestData.RewardText: How did such a thing end up in the stomach of a nightstalker? Could the debris from the crash have contaminated more beasts?
